items.badge_description: We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 5 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 2! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: Last one. Aged 10 years. Still have a small amount of hop aroma and flavor. And the flavor has changed ... But may be a perfect example of how English IPA tasted in India after long journeys by sea.

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 10 distinct venues!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 5 states or countries.
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 10 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 3!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 5 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 2.

items.badge_description: While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 420 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 85!
